product.longDescription:
STRATUM 2.0 Carry On Spinner is perfect for a 1-3 day trip, this little guy has everything you need to make your quick getaway stress free and fun!
• Sturdy handling with our ergonomic carbon fiber texture trolley grip that adjusts to you size.
• Roll confidently with our wear and tear tested ball wheel.
• It delivers maximum stability and comfort.
• Smooth operator for hands of all kinds, our large zipper pulls are effortless to use.
• Textured shiny ABS shell, barrel shape with precise details.
• Max-capacity interior, including a modesty pocket, mesh door pocket, and elastic tie tapes.
• Case expands 1• Carry-On size and weight allowances vary by airlines. Visit the Carry-On Guide for more details. If the bag is overstuffed, it may not be accepted by the airlines"
• Weight: 7.28 lbs.

Body Dimensions: 20.5" x 14.5" x 9.5"
Overall Dimensions: 22.0" x 15.0" x 9.5"
product.shortDescription: Stratum 2.0 Carry On Spinner is perfect for a 1-3 day trip, this little guy has everything you need to make your quick getaway stress free and fun!

tooltip: Luggage is made from a vacuum-formed or pressure-formed shell. Strong ABS plastic, a temperature-resistant, highly impact-resistant material, is combined with a textured finish for the classic hardside look.
The total dimensions of the case including handles and wheels
The dimensions of the case without handles or wheels; packing dimensions
Does the case expand for added packing capacity?
Warranty covers manufacturing defects. For more information please visit our warranty page

product.pageTitle: Stratum 2.0 Carry-On Spinner | Hardside Luggage | American Tourister
product.pageDescription: Upgrade your travel game with the sleek Stratum 2.0 Carry-On Spinner Luggage, which is perfect for the modern traveler.
product.pageKeywords: american tourister stratum 2.0 20 carry-on hardside spinner, white suitcase carry on, white luggage carry on, white carry on suitcase, white carry on luggage,
